newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: ROKISHKIS CHEESE MOST ACTIVE STOCK ON CM.
newsitem.headline: ROKISHKIS CHEESE MOST ACTIVE STOCK ON CM.

text.p: Lithuania's national stock exchange said on Monday that the most active stock on the central market last week in terms of turnover was Rokishkis Cheese in trade of 644,000 litas.
The bourse also said in a statement that Rokishkis was followed by Alytaus Textile at 463,000 litas and the Lithuanian Sea Shipping company with turnover of 410,000 litas.
Vilniaus Bank was the most active in block trades last week and registered business of 768,000 litas. It was followed by Hermis bank which saw shares worth 682,000 litas change hands.
Snaige fridge producer, the third most active share in block trading last week, made a turnover of 541,000 million litas.
The bourse also said that the gainers of the week on the bourse were Malsena and Snaige. Each rose more than nine percent.
Lietkabelis and spirits producer Sema eased the most in group A, the bourse said. Lietkabelis lost 25.56 percent while Sema fell 24.38 last week.
